description: Benchmark evaluation for RAG system using Helmet and License Plate Detection using Deep Learning (Major Project Report).

questions.question: What is the main objective and problem statement of the Helmet and License Plate Detection project described in the report?
Which algorithms and deep learning models are used for helmet detection and license plate recognition in the system, and what is the rationale for their selection?
What are the reported performance metrics for helmet detection and license plate recognition, including accuracy, precision, recall, and mAP values?
What are the main limitations of the system described in the report, particularly regarding low-light conditions, OCR accuracy, and generalization?
What future enhancements does the report propose for both helmet detection and license plate recognition to improve robustness and deployment?
What dataset sizes and training configuration are used for helmet detection and for license plate detection (epochs, batch size, image size)?
Describe the high-level system architecture and data flow from image input to helmet and license plate detection and OCR.
What testing methodology and environments are described in the report (unit testing, integration testing, system testing, and KPIs)?
